192394.「どうも 頭の中が\n 洗い流されたように 真っ白でな……。:
Sorry. My mind has been feeling very fuzzy
recently. I can't remember anything.

192395.「思いだせるのは……\n 青い港町……誰かの後ろ姿……。:
I can remember... a blue port town... the back
of someone's head...

192396.「ふーむ やっかいキュ。 \n こいつは 時間跳躍の後遺症っキュね。:
Hmmm... this is a problem. This is a clear
side effect of time-traveling, kyu.

192398.「<pc>も 知ってのとおり\n エテーネ人にも 時渡りのチカラを\n 持つ個体:
As <pc> knows, there are two types of
Etheneans: those who have the power to travel
through time and those who do not, kyu.

192399.「適性のない個体が 無理に時を渡れば \n 人体にかかる負担は 計り知れず\n:
If an unfit individual is forced to cross
time, the burden on the body is immeasurable
and can cause unforeseen harm, kyu.

192400.「この男は 記憶の喪失だけですんで \n まだ 幸運なほうっキュ。:
This man is lucky to have only lost his
memory, kyu.

192401.「……本当に それだけかは わからないけど\n ともかく 経過を観察するキュ。:
...There's no way to tell if that's the extent
of the damage, so let's just keep an eye on
him for now, kyu.

192402.「魔法生物に 好かれるヤツは \n いいヤツだと……誰かが 言っていた……。:
Someone once told me that magical creatures
tend to be friendly to those with good
hearts...

192403.「<pc>…… \n うまく 言葉に できないが…… \n そなたは 不思議と…:
<pc>... I can't quite put it into
words, but you are strangely... familiar.

192404.「目覚めたか ファラス殿。: Mr. Faras. I see you're awake.

192405.「ファラス……それが 自分の名ですかな。 \n ……なるほど しっくりくる。: Faras... is that my name? I see... it fits.

192406.「我が国の王は 魔獣を倒してくれた そなたを \n 賓客として もてなすそうだ。:
Our king will host you as his honored guest
for defeating the Hexabeasts. You are welcome
to look around the castle.

192407.「そいつは 大いに助かる……。 \n 部屋にこもっているのは 性に合わんのでな。:
That would be nice... I don't like being
cooped up in this room. I'm going to get some
fresh air.

192409.「さて <pc>。 \n 先ほど グレン城のバグド王より\n そなたへ 直々に:
Well, <pc>. I have just received a
personal summons to you from King Bagudo of
Glen Castle.

192410.「……グレン上空に 例の繭が現れたそうだ。:
...The cocoon has appeared in the sky over
Glen.

192412.「<pc> そなたも 見たか？\n この城の空に浮かぶ 奇怪な繭を。:
<pc>. Have you seen it too? The
strange thing up in the sky?

192413.「グランゼドーラで見たものと うりふたつ……\n というより 同一の存在であろう:
It looks to be the same one we saw in Gran
Zedora. If so, it's safe to assume this
country will be attacked next.

192414.「聞けば アンルシア姫でも 苦戦するほどに\n 強い魔獣が 現れたそうだな。:
I heard even a formidable warrior like Anlucia
had trouble bringing down these "Hexabeasts".

192415.「急ぎ 国の防備を 固めねば……。\n <pc>も チカラを貸してくれ。:
We must quickly fortify our country's
defenses... Please, lend us your strength as
well, <pc>.

192416.「おお そなたは……\n ランガーオ村の 村王の使いの者だな？:
Oh, you... you're a messenger from Langao
Village, aren't you?

192417.「……はっ。\n オーグリードの盾の盟約に従い\n 村王クリフゲーンの 伝令とし:
In accordance with the pact of Ogreed's
shield, I've come bearing a message from Chief
Cliffgain.

192418.「ロンダの氷穴で 異形の魔物を連れた \n 不審な者が 目撃されたとのことです。:
A suspicious person was seen in the Rhonda Ice
Cave with an oddly shaped monster.

192420.「ほう……。\n グランゼドーラで 魔物を放った者も\n そのような 身なりをし:
Oh? The man who summoned the Hexabeasts in
Gran Zedora was also wearing black armor.

192421.「ロンダ岬か……嫌な場所に 現れたものだ。: Rhonda Cape... of all the places to show up.

192422.「バグド王よ。 \n これは ただならぬ事態やもしれぬ。\n すみやかに 最悪の:
King Bagudo. This may be a dangerous
situation. Prepare for the worst immediately.

192423.「わしは <pc>とともに \n 急ぎ ロンダ岬へ向かう。……行くぞ！:
<pc> and I will head to Rhonda Cape
at once. Let's go!

192424.「礼は言わぬぞ 人間……。: Do not expect my gratitude, human...

192425.「代わりに 存分に 暴れてやろう！！: You too shall become one with the beast!

192426.「やられたな……。\n オーグリードにとって 最悪の事態じゃ。:
No... This is the worst thing that could
happen to Ogreed.

192427.「この大陸は １３００年前……\n ゾンガロンによって 滅ぼされかけておる。:
Zongalon... The beast that nearly destroyed
the continent 1,300 years ago!

192428.「わしも チカラを貸す。\n <pc> 食い止めてくれ！:
With me, <pc>. We must seal him
away once more!

192429.「まさか 復活した我の相手が 貴様ら程度か？\n ……下等生物が 身の程を知れ。:
Hah! Are you weaklings the only ones brave
enough to challenge my return? Know your
place.

192430.「知性を捨て 獣となるがいい！:
Let your minds fade away, and become as
beasts!

192432.「グハハ みっともない姿だな……。\n 我の復讐の 前菜として 喰らってやろう！:
Pitiful forms worthy of your pathetic
strength... You shall make excellent
appetizers.

192433.「…………フム。\n さすがに 今は チカラが足りぬか。\n 我が かつての全能:
My imprisonment has weakened me more than I
thought. However, when my full power has
returned...

192434.「……今度こそ すべてのオーガを 滅ぼさん。: This time, I shall destroy all the Ogres!

192436.「あれが ゾンガロンの伝承に聞く\n 人の心を奪い 獣に 変えてしまう光か。:
That was Zongalon's power... to corrupt the
hearts of mortals, and turn them into
monsters.

192437.「<pc>よ……。\n ヤツを ふたたび 封印せねば\n オーグリードは 終わり:
<pc>... if we cannot find a way to
seal him, then Ogreed is finished.

192438.「しかし かの封印は 太古のもの……。 \n そのすべは 忘れ去られて 久しい…:
Unfortunately, the ancient sealing methods
have been long since forgotten.

192439.「だが 幸運にも……悠久の時を ものともせぬ \n 時渡りの名手が ここにおった:
Good thing I happen to know a master of time
travel.

192440.「……ゾンガロン封印の すべを知るため\n かつてのオーグリードへ 行ってくれる:
Would you go to the past Ogreed to learn how
to seal Zongalon, <pc>?<yesno><close>

192442.「……そろそろ ボクの出番だと 思ってたキュ。 \n どの時代へ 移動したいキュ:
Guess that means it's time for me to get to
work, kyu. Where are we going?

192443.「おぬしたちの 向かうべきは\n いにしえの オーガの勇士たちが\n ゾンガロン:
You are headed back to the time when the brave
Ogre warriors sealed Zongalon 1,300
years ago.

192444.「あの封印を 媒介すれば よさそうキュ。:
We will likely be able to travel from there,
kyu.

192445.「時間設定……１２８７年前。\n エテーネルキューブ 起動キュ！:
Time set: 1287 years ago. Ethenel Kyube,
activate!

192446.「…………いい度胸だよ。\n 精鋭兵の ただ中に 飛び込んでくるなんて。:
You've got some nerve. Jumping right in front
of an elite warrior.

192447.「それもまた 獣ゆえの 無謀さかねえ？ \n ……鬼人国のスパイさん。:
So reckless. For a spy of the Demonkin...
You're pretty sloppy.

192448.「アンタのことは オルセコ王国 現当主\n ギルガラン王子が 直々に裁いてくださ:
Though you don't deserve such an honor,
Prince Gilgaran, current leader of Orseco,
shall judge you personally.

192450.「俺の敵に生まれたことが 運の尽きだ。\n 次は オルセコの民に 生まれてこい。:
It's your own damn fault for being born my
enemy. Next time, be born an Ogre of Orseco.

192451.「せめて 安らかに眠れ。: But for now... rest in peace.

192452.「獣に死を！ 死を！ 死を！: Death to the beast! Death to the beast!

192454.「グリエよ……邪魔だてするなら \n お前もろとも 断ち切るぞ。:
Grie... if you interfere, I won't hesitate to
cut you down as well.

192455.「この者 瞳に 意志が宿っております。\n 心失いし 獣には見えません。:
This one has strength in their eyes. They do
not look like one who has lost their mind as
a beast.

192457.「<pc>さん……ですね。\n 身につけていたものから 想像するに\n 遠い国よ:
<pc>... from what you were
wearing, I'm guessing you're a traveler from
afar.

192458.「……僕に 預けていただけませんか？\n 国に益をもたらす 情報を引きだしてみせ:
Brother, will you entrust this one to me? I'll
extract information that will be of use to
Orseco.

192459.「何様のつもりだ。\n いつから 俺に 意見できる身になった？:
Who do you think you are? Since when do you
have the right to order me around?

192460.「まぁねぇ……\n こんな にやけ顔じゃ 鬼人には見えないよね。:
Well... you don't look like a Demonkin with
such a smirk on your face.

192461.「弟王子サマが 面倒みるってんなら \n ひとつ 任せてみてもいいんじゃない？\:
If it's your brother taking care of things,
there should be nothing to worry about, right?

192462.「興が 削がれた……。 \n 二度と 俺の前に 現れるな。:
I've lost interest... Don't ever show your
face to me again.

192463.「ご無事で よかった……。 \n キミに これ以上 危害がくわえられないよう\n:
I'm glad you're safe... and rest assured that
I will make sure that no further harm comes to
you.

192464.「よろしければ 僕の私室で\n すこし お話しをしませんか？:
If you'd like, could we have a little chat in
my chambers?

192465.「この玉座の間を出て 右手に部屋があります。\n ……それでは お待ちしています:
It's the room on your right as you exit the
throne room. I'll be waiting for you there.

192467.「僕は この国の第二王子 グリエと申します。\n 先ほどの 兄の非礼を お許しく:
I am Grie, second prince of this kingdom.
Please forgive my brother's rudeness earlier.

192469.「遠方からの 旅の方ならば \n さぞや とまどわれていることでしょう。\n よ:
If you're a traveler, you must be very
confused by the situation here. Allow me to
explain.

192470.「オーグリード大陸が どんな惨状にあるかを。:
About the current state of affairs in
Ogreed...

192471.<center>……今から数年前 悪鬼ゾンガロンと呼ばれる\n怪物が 突如 現れ:
A few years ago, a monster called Zongalon
suddenly appeared.

192472.<center>ゾンガロンは 各地で オーガを襲い\nいくつもの集落が 滅ぼされ:
Zongalon attacked Ogres in various places,
destroying many settlements.

192473.<center>当時 このオルセコ王国は\n隣国のドランドと 戦争をしていたので:
At that time, the Orseco Kingdom was at war
with its neighbor, Drand...

192474.<center>悪鬼ゾンガロンは ドランド王国を陥落させ\nドランドの民の心を奪:
Zongalon attacked Drand, and using its foul
magic, corrupted the hearts and minds of its
people.

192475.<center>心を奪われたオーガは 獣のように凶暴になり\n『鬼人』と 呼ばれ:
The Ogres corrupted by Zongalon's magic became
known as "Demonkin".

192476.<center>……そして 鬼人国が誕生したのです。: ...and thus, the Demonkin's Domain was born.

192477.「僕たちは 今まさに 鬼人国の脅威にさらされ\n ゾンガロンに 滅ぼされようとし:
Orseco now fights for survival against
Zongalon and his new kingdom.

192478.「だから 兄さんも 余裕がなくなっていて……: That's why my brother can't afford to be...

192479.「クチは悪いけど 国を守ろうと必死なんです。\n どうか 大目に見てやってくださ:
I know he can be rude at times, but he's
doing all he can to defend our country. Please
forgive him.

192480.「すっかり 長話になってしまいましたね。\n 僕でよければ この国を 案内しまし:
That was a long talk. Here, how about I show
you around?

192481.「おや……ちょっと 失礼しますね。: Oh... excuse me for a moment.

192482.「<pc>は トラブル体質っキュね……。\n まあ あの第二王子様は 話が通じそ:
You're quite the troublemaker,
<pc>. It's a good thing that
second prince is friendly, kyu.

192483.「すみません……オルセコ王国の 民たちから\n たくさん 陳情書が届きまして……:
I'm sorry... but I've received many petitions
from the people of the kingdom...

192484.「どうやら その……兄さんが あちこちで\n 騒動を 起こしているようなのです。:
It seems that my brother has been causing
problems here and there... I need to head out
and set things right.

192485.「ああ そうだ！ <pc>さんも \n ２件ほど お手伝いしていただけませんか？:
Oh, <pc>, why don't you help me
with some of these?

192486.「この国の民の心に 親しむには \n 正直 兄さんへの苦情を 聞いてあげるのが\:
The best way for you to get to know this place
would be to assist in solving the people's
problems.

192487.<pc>は グリエから\nビントンの陳情書（だいじなもの）と\nリセセの陳情書（:
<pc> received
Vinton's Petition (Key Item) and
Risese's Petition (Key Item) from Grie!<me 60>

192488.「僕のほうも 陳情書を解決しながら 最後に \n オルセコ王国領 王家の墓に行く:
I'm planning on visiting the Orseco Royal Tomb
once I've finished my duties. We can meet
there once you're done.

192489.「ああっ <pc>さん。 \n お手伝いくださり ありがとうございました。:
Ah, <pc>. Thank you for your
assistance.

192490.「……ええ。すでに 報告は受けています。 \n キミが 真摯に 話を聞いてくださ:
I've already received a report. Everyone is
grateful for your assistance.

192491.「グリエ様は １０人ぶんの\n 苦情を 聞いたらしいゼ！ 人がいいよナ！:
Prince Grie just finished solving 10 requests!
Such a kind soul...

192492.「オイラんちは 代々 ここの墓守をしてんダ。\n ここには オルセコ王国の\n:
My family have been grave keepers for
generations! In this tomb rests all the kings
of Orseco!

192493.「ボッチィさんからも 陳情書をいただきましたが\n この場所でも……兄さんが？:
I received a petition from Mr. Bocchi as well.
Don't tell me... my brother was here, too?

192495.「あの人 さっき ドカドカとやってきて\n 王様の墓を 掘り返したんダ！:
He just came in here and dug up the king's
tomb!

192497.「どうしたも こうしたも わからんケド！\n しかも 埋葬品の鏡を 持ってッチま:
I couldn't stop him. He came in, dug up the
grave, and made off with a mirror left as a
burial artifact.

192498.「墓ドロボーだよ 墓ドロボー！: I can't believe our king is a grave robber!

192499.「あーあ 先王様の時代は よかったナァ。\n どうして 亡くなっちまったんだろう:
Ah, the days of the previous king were good,
weren't they? Why did he have to die...

192500.「……それは 失礼をいたしました。 \n 埋葬品を戻すよう 兄を説得してみますね:
...I am very sorry about this. I will try to
convince my brother to return the mirror.

192502.「これから 兄さんと話そうと思います。 \n キミの活躍ぶりも 聞いてもらおうと:
I'm going to go talk to my brother now. I'd
like for you to join me. He may want an update
on what you've been up to.

192503.「今の時間だと 兄さんは オルセコ闘技城の\n 舞台で 鍛錬をしているはずです。:
At this time of day, my brother can usually
be found training in the arena. Let's meet up
there.

192504.「二度と 顔を見せるなと 言ったはずだが？:
I thought I told you never to show your face
again.

192505.「兄さん……<cs_pchero>さんは \n オルセコの民の悩みを たちどころ:
Brother, please... <pc> here has
been nothing but helpful to the people of
Orseco.

192507.「それで……民より 訴えがありました。 \n 兄さんが あちこちで やんちゃして:
The people complained again... They say you've
been causing trouble all over the kingdom...

192508.「何か 理由があってのことと 思いますが…… \n 王家の墓を あばいて 有無を:
Now I hear that you've ransacked the royal
tomb and stole one of the burial artifacts.
Why are you doing this?

192509.「民は 兄さんの声を 聞きたがっています。\n 言葉なくして 想いは伝わりません:
The people crave leadership. They need to hear
the voice of their king.

192510.「黙っていろ グリエ。今は 俺が王だ。: Shut up, Grie. I'm king now.

192511.「そして オルセコの民は 王の所有物。\n ……俺に 従っていればいい。:
The people of Orseco are property of the king.
...The only thing they need to do is obey.

192512.「それでは 民の心は 離れるばかりだよ……。: All you're doing is pushing the people away...

192515.「今度は 本物の 鬼人国の刺客らしいな。\n <cs_pchero>とやら……\:
Finally, a real Demonkin assassin has come.
<pc>... If you claim to be an ally
of Orseco, prove it to me now!

192516.「ニクジルヲ……シタタラセル……。: We gonna... boil you into stew...

192517.「ブヒュゥゥ……。\n コノ程度ナラ タヤスイ……。: Buhyuu... A small price ta pay...

192518.「マモナク 鬼人ガ 群レトナリテ\n オルセコヲ 攻メ滅ボスダロウ……。: Soon, da Demonkin come and destroy Orseco...

192520.「宣戦布告……ということでしょうか？: Was that... a declaration of war?

192521.「<cs_pchero>さんが お強かったので\n なんとか 勝てましたが……。:
It's a good thing <pc> was here.
I had no idea you were so strong.

192522.「兄さん……。 \n 民に呼びかけ 兵を集めて\n 国の守りを固めましょう。:
Brother, we should rally our defenses and
prepare for an attack from the Demonkin.

192524.「攻めてくるのなら その前に\n つぶせばいいだけのことだ。:
If they want to attack us, I will simply
destroy them before they get the chance.

192526.「……俺が戻るまで ここを任せるぞ。:
...You're in charge of this place until I get
back.

192527.「兄さんは たしかに この国で \n 最強とうたわれる 一騎当千の武人ですが……:
Though it's true my brother is the strongest
warrior in Ogreed...

192528.「まさか 鬼人国に\n ひとりで 攻め入る気なのか……。:
Surely he doesn't believe he can invade the
Demonkin's Domain by himself...?

192529.「このままでは あの人は 死んでしまいます。 \n <cs_pchero>さん:
He'll die if we let him go! Come,
<pc>. Let's stop him before it's
too late!

192530.「鬼人の居城……鬼岩城は オルセコ王国領の東\n ドランド平原を 突っ切った先に:
The fortress where the Demonkin reside, called
the Badrocks, is located in the Drand Plains
to the east. Please, you must help me!

192531.「これが 難攻不落とうたわれた\n 強国ドランドの 末路か……。:
So this is the fate of the once undefeatable
nation of Drand...

192532.「僕らの父王 ゾルトグリンは\n 類まれな戦術家でしたが\n この城は落とせない:
Our father, King Zoltgrin, was an exceptional
tactician, but he often lamented that he was
never able to take this castle.

192533.「そんな城に ひとりで 突っ込んでいくなんて\n まったく ギルガランらしい……:
It's so typical of Gilgaran to go into a
place like that by himself...

192534.「兄さんは すでに 侵入して \n ドランド王の玉座を 目指しているでしょう。:
My brother has already broken in and is
probably on his way to King Drand's throne.

192535.「中は 鬼人だらけです。\n くれぐれも お気をつけて……。:
The place is filled with Demonkin. Let's
proceed carefully...

192536.「こんなところに 猫ちゃんが……。: A cat in a place like this...

192538.「あはは かわいいなぁ。\n <pc>さんのこと 好きみたいですね。:
Haha, that's cute. She seems to like
you.

192540.「不思議な 猫ちゃんだなぁ。\n あの子のおかげで 光明が見えましたね。:
What a strange cat. We probably wouldn't have
found that secret entrance without it.

192545.「我ラノ血 我ラノ肉……\n スベテ ゾンガロン様ノ糧……。:
My blood, my flesh... my soul for Master
Zongalon...

192546.「轟雷王と呼ばれ 何者の風下に立つことも\n 決して許さなかった 貴様が \n:
What a pitiful sight. The Roaring Thunder King
who would kneel to no one and demand respect
from all, now lives as a subservient beast!

192547.「みじめだな……ドランドの王よ。: I will end your misery, King of Drand.

192548.「若造ニハ ワカルマイ……。\n イカナル強キ者モ 賢キ者モ……: Young warrior... you do not yet understand...

192549.「圧倒的ナ チカラヲ前ニシテ コウベヲタレ…… \n 甘美ナル敗北の味ヲ 知ル時:
Soon, you shall learn the taste of sweet
defeat in the face of overwhelming power...

192551.「貴様ノ血 貴様ノ肉……\n スベテ ゾンガロン様ノ糧トセン！！:
Your blood, your flesh... I shall offer it all
to Lord Zongalon!

192552.「こんな 形で……\n 終わりとうは なかった……。:
I didn't want it to end like this... not in
this form...

192553.「祖国を 守れぬ 王など……\n ……王に あらず。:
A king who cannot protect his country... is no
king at all.

192554.「どれほどの 人々の運命が\n ゾンガロンによって 狂わされたのでしょう。:
How many people's lives have been destroyed
by Zongalon?

192555.<center>狂えよ 狂え……\n我が手のひらで 踊り狂え。:
Go crazy, go mad... dance wildly in the palm
of my hand.

192558.「愚かな オーガどもの 殺し合いを\n 高みから 見物させてもらったぞ。:
I've been watching from on high as you stupid
Ogres killed each other.

192559.「ああ 愉快 愉快。 \n 今 我は 満腹の心持ちよ……。:
Ahhh, such joy. Such bloodlust is as a feast
to me...

192560.「誇り高き貴様が なぜ 獣に身を落とした？:
Why did you, a proud warrior, let yourself
become a monster!?

192566.「父の誕生日に 俺が贈ったものだ。: ...was a gift from me to my father.

192567.「クククク……ゾルトグリンなど\n とうに 捨てた名だ。:
Heh, heh, heh...
I've long since discarded that name.

192568.「なぜですか 父上……。\n 皆が あれほど愛し 敬ったあなたが……:
But why, Father...!? Your people loved you!
They respected you!

192569.「なぜ 我らを 滅ぼそうとするのですか？: Why do you seek to destroy us?!

192570.「気色悪い……父などと呼ぶな！\n 我は チカラを求め……チカラを得た。:
Don't call me "father"! I sought power... and
I obtained it.

192571.「我にとって 真の姿とは この姿よ……。: For me, this is my true form!

192572.「苦しめ！ 憎め！ 恐怖しろ！\n その すべてが 我のさらなる糧となる！:
Suffer! Hate! Tremble in fear! All of it
serves to feed me!

192574.「……話は 城でだ。帰るぞ。: We'll talk at the castle. Let's go home.

192575.「……兄さんが 王家の墓を あばいたのは\n ラーの鏡が 必要だったからなんです:
...So you raided the Royal Tomb because
you needed the Mirror of Ra.

192576.「僕は 全然 気づけなかった……。\n やっぱり 兄さんは すごいです。:
I can't believe I didn't notice. You really
are amazing, after all.

192578.「父上にも……何か 理由があるのでしょうか？ \n 僕らには 見せられない\n:
Did father... have a reason for what he
did? Did he have some pain he couldn't show
us?

192579.「獣に身を落とし 祖国を滅ぼそうとするなど\n いかなる 理由があろうと 許され:
Reasons are irrelevant. I will not allow
anyone, for whatever reason, to wage war on
the people of Orseco.

192580.「父は しょせん \n 王の器では なかったということだ。: Father was a weak man, one unfit to be king.

192581.「……王とて 人ですよ ギルガラン。\n 人並みに 苦しむこともある。:
...Even kings are people, Gilgaran. They can
suffer just as much as anyone.

192582.「つらいことがあるなら 一緒に背負いたかった。:
If you were struggling, I'd want to be there
to support you.

192583.「俺を さとしているつもりか。\n お前は いつから そんなに偉くなった？:
How dare you judge me!? Since when did you
become my superior, huh?

192584.「グリエ……お前ごときに 王の何がわかる？:
You know nothing of what it means to be a
king, Grie!

192585.「背負うものがない 第二王子は \n 引っ込んでいろ！！:
You're just an insignificant second prince, so
stay out of this!

192586.「アンタさ……グリエ様を\n 軽んじるのも いいかげんにしなよ。:
You... how dare you talk to Prince Grie with
such disrespect!

192587.「本当に 王を継ぐ資格が あるのはさ\n アンタがいつも バカにしてる……:
There is only one person in this room that is
truly qualified to sit on that throne...

192588.「目の前の グリエ様なんだよ！！: And that person is Prince Grie!

192590.「グリエ様が アンタを 心配して当然だろう！:
I don't blame Prince Grie for being worried
about you!

192591.「アンタの 兄さんなんだから！: He's your older brother, after all!

192594.「安心してください ギルガラン。 \n 僕には 王を継ぐ意志も 資格もありません:
Rest assured, Gilgaran. I have neither the
will nor the qualifications to succeed to the
throne.

192595.「……兄というのは 本当です。\n ただ 僕の病弱な身体では\n 世継ぎに ふさ:
Though it is true I am the older brother, my
sickly and weak body made me unfit to be heir.

192596.「弟と偽っていたのは せめて\n キミのチカラに なりたかったからですが……:
I pretended otherwise because I wanted to help
you and this country...

192597.「これ以上 僕がいると 国を乱しかねません。\n だから……去りますね。:
My continued presence may cause issues, so
I... I will leave Orseco.

192599.「大臣 どういうことだ……。\n 皆して 俺を たばかっていたと……？:
What's the meaning of this, minister? Have you
all been deceiving me?

192600.「いえ……真実を 知っていたのは \n グリエ様と先王ゾルトグリン様 王妃ララリ:
No... only Prince Grie, Former King Zoltgrin,
Queen Lalaria, and I knew the truth...

192601.「これは 先王様の 深いお考えが\n あってのことなのです……。:
Hiding the truth, naming you heir... It was
all the former king's idea.

192602.「バカにされたものだな……。: I've been made a fool of...

192603.「俺は ゾンガロン討伐の 支度をする。\n 邪魔立てはするな。:
I'm going to prepare to meet Zongalon in
battle. Stay out of my way.

192604.「あ～～～ 墓場まで 持ってく気だったのに\n やっちまったよーーーー！:
Ahhhhh, I was supposed to take that secret
with me to the grave. Now I've really done it!

192605.「今日の宮廷記録には いったい\n なんて 書きゃいいんだ……。:
What am I supposed to write in the court
records today...

192606.「すまないね <pc>さん……。 \n アンタの前で こんな いざこざを見せてさ:
Sorry for dragging you into all this,
<pc>. Please keep what you heard here
a secret.

192607.「しっかし ゾンガロン…… \n あの偉大なる ゾルトグリン様を\n 倒す方法な:
As for Zongalon, I have no idea how we can
defeat such a terrifying foe.

192608.「ギルガラン様 どうすんだろね？ \n また 暴走しなきゃいいけど……。:
I wonder what Prince Gilgaran is planning?
Hopefully he doesn't try anything too
reckless.

192609.「大臣なんて 心配事ばかりさ……。\n 時々 未来の自分の 宮廷記録を \n 盗:
Being minister is hard work. Sometimes I wish
I had a way to see court records from the
future. I might be able to help out more...

192610.「あの 大臣……\n 記録を残してるって 言ってたキュ。:
Hear that? The minister said she keeps court
records, kyu.

192611.「もし 未来に その記録が残っているなら\n ゾンガロンを 封印した方法も\n:
If we were to go to the future and check
the court records there, wouldn't it tell us
how they ended up defeating Zongalon, kyu?

192612.「さっそく 現代の オルセコ闘技場へ\n 行ってみるっキュ！:
Let's go check the Orseco ruins in the
present, kyu!

192613.『ムニュ大臣の宮廷記録 第二十六章』:
"Records of the Court of Minister Munyu,
Chapter XXVI"

192614.<center>これまでに 多くのオーガが 命を賭したが\nいまだ 悪鬼ゾンガロ:
Many augurs have given up their lives,
but the seal of Zongalon has yet to
be completed.

192615.<center>……封印のために 最初の犠牲となったのは\nその方法を見つけてき:
...The first casualty of the sealing was
Prince Gilgaran, who initially discovered the
sealing technique.

192616.<center>ゾンガロンの魔力は あまりに強大で……\n封印には １００年もの:
Zongalon's power is so great and terrible that
it will take 100 years for us to seal it away.

192617.<center>どうやら アタイが 生きているうちに\n平和なオルセコを 目にす:
It's unlikely that I will ever see a peaceful
Orseco in my lifetime.

192618.「あの 偉そうな王子様…… \n ギルガランってヤツ 死んじゃうっキュね。:
It looks like that pompous Prince Gilgaran
died while attempting to seal Zongalon, kyu.

192619.「そんなことより ゾンガロンの封印に\n １００年もの時間が かかるキュル？:
But that doesn't matter. The important bit is
that it took 100 years to seal Zongalon, kyu.

192620.「そんなことしてるうちに\n 滅びの未来が やってくるっキュ。:
Unfortunately for us, we don't have 100 years
to spare, kyu.

192621.「……あの すみません。\n 先ほど ギルガランと 聞こえまして……。:
Um...excuse me. I just heard you say Gilgaran
earlier...

192622.「よかった……！ その名を知ってるなんて \n あなたは オルセコ王国史を 研究:
Good! I'm surprised that you know that name.
You must be an archaeologist studying the
history of the Orseco Kingdom.

192623.「僕は エリガン。\n かつて オルセコ王国の 王家の血筋であった\n グリエと:
My name is Eligan. I am the descendant of a
man named Grie, who was once a member of the
royal bloodline of Orseco Kingdom.

192624.「我が家の書庫の 古い巻物の中に……\n 先祖 グリエの手記が\n 何万もの字で:
Among the old scrolls in my study were tens
of thousands of pages from the journal of my
ancestor Grie.

192625.「グリエは ギルガランを 死なせてしまった。 \n そのことを 一生 悔やんでい:
What Grie wrote about the most was his regret
of letting Gilgaran die.

192626.「どうやら 先祖は 弟らの犠牲を出さずに \n ゾンガロンを封印する 別の手段を:
Apparently, he was on the verge of discovering
a method to seal Zongalon without requiring a
sacrifice.

192627.「ここで会えたのも 何かの縁でしょう……。 \n どうか これを 研究に役立てて:
I'm sure it's fate that we met here. I
hope you will use this for your research.

192628.<pc>は エリガンから\nガズバランのしるし（だいじなもの）を\n受け取った！:
<pc> received
the Gazbalan Badge (Key Item) from Eligan!<me 60>

192629.「これは 先祖グリエが 求めていたもの……。\n しかし 手に入った時には 手遅:
This is what Grie was working on, but by the
time he finished it, it was too late...

192630.「僕は 先祖の手記を読んで \n いてもたっても いられず……思いあまって\n:
After reading the memories of my ancestors, I
felt the urge to come and see the place for
myself.

192631.「あなたに出会えて よかった……。\n 何か 大切なことを 果たせたように思いま:
I am glad to have met you... I think I was
able to accomplish something important.

192632.「やれやれ…… ここにおったか。\n 探したぞ <pc>よ。 \n まずいことに:
There you are, <pc>. I've been
trying to contact you. Something terrible has
happened!

192633.「……ゾンガロンとは別の 異形の怪物が\n グレン城に 降りたったのだ。\n 急:
A monster is attacking Glen Castle, and it's
not Zongalon this time. We need to hurry!

192636.「行け 原獣プレゴーグよ！\n 本能のままに 暴れるがいい！:
Go, Pregog! Give our guests here a
warm welcome!

192638.「オーグリードは 我の大地。\n ここで暴れていいのは 我のみよ……。:
Ogreed is mine! Only I have the right to run
wild in these lands!

192639.「……ゲテモノは ウマいというが\n どうやら 真実らしいな。:
Ahhhhh. There's nothing quite like the taste
of a fresh kill...

192640.「昔日のチカラが よみがえっていく……。 \n コイツを 消化しきれば\n 封印:
YES! I can feel it! My power from before the
sealing is returning!

192641.「１３００年分の 復讐だ。\n 震えて 待つがいい…………。:
1,300 years I have waited for vengeance. Soon,
all of Ogreed shall burn!

192642.「あの怪物を 倒してくれたのだな。\n 重ねて 礼を言うぞ <cs_pchero:
Well fought, <pc>. Thank you for
defeating that horrible beast for us.

192643.「……して <cs_pchero>よ。\n 先刻は 聞きそびれてしまったが\n:
With that taken care of, let's get back to the
matter at hand. What did you discover about
the sealing of Zongalon?

192644.「封印に １００年の年月が かかるだと！？\n その間に 大地は荒廃しきるぞ……:
100 years!? We don't have 100 years! All the
world will be destroyed...

192645.「オルセコ王子の 子孫を 名乗る者が \n 別の封印手段があると 申したのは 確:
We'll have to rely on the information you
learned from that stranger in Orseco. This
supposed alternate sealing method.

192646.「……これは 導きではあるまいか。 \n その方法を グリエとやらに聞けば\n:
This may be exactly what we need. Should an
alternate sealing method really exist...

192647.「<cs_pchero>よ。 \n 今一度 過去に戻り グリエに会ってくるのだ！:
<pc>, please go back to the past
and ask Grie about this!

192649.「ちっ……獣すら 俺をあざわらうか。: Damn... even mere animals mock me.

192650.「王になって 国を背負った気でいたが\n これじゃまるで ハリボテの王だな……。:
I thought I was king! I held the weight of
this nation on my back! Yet now I've been made
a fool of...

192651.「貴様……何を 見ている。: You... what are you looking at?

192652.「俺を心配して来たのなら 無用だ。\n あの程度で 俺は揺るがん。:
If you're worried about me, don't be. I care
not for your sympathies.

192654.「……お前も あいつの行方を 知らんのか。\n クソッ 腹だたしい……。: You don't know where he is either? Damn it!

192655.「国王が 命じる。\n あんなヤツは 放っておいて 俺に手を貸せ。:
The king of Orseco commands you! Forget about
Grie and come assist me!

192656.「ちょうど 使える手ゴマが\n ほしかったところだ。:
I need some capable assistance for the task
ahead.

192657.「貴様も 知ってのとおり……\n ゾンガロンは この国の先王だ。\n 父の身に何:
You are one of the few who know that Zongalon
is my father, the previous king of Orseco.

192658.「城の地下に 父の部屋が 残されている。 \n まずは そこを探るぞ。:
His room is still down in the basement. We
should check there for any clues behind his
motives.

192659.「……どうやら 当たりらしいな。:
Good work. Looks like you've found his
journal.

192660.<center>……愛しき妻 ララリアよ。\nお前が逝ってから 我は老いてしまっ:
My dear wife, my dear Lalaria. Since your
passing, I have grown weary.

192661.<center>ドランド王国は 強い。\n毎夜のように 軍略をめぐらせたが\nあ:
The kingdom of Drand is strong. Night after
night, they plot against us, but we have no
way to conquer their strong castle.

192662.<center>このままでは 子らの世代に\n戦争を 継がせることになってしまう:
If I don't do something about it, I'll be
handing down the war to our children.

192663.<center>それだけは 何としても 避けたい。: I want to avoid that at all costs.

192665.<center>ギルガランは 我の思い描いた夢のままに\nしんのある 強きオーガ:
Gilgaran grew into a strong Ogre with a
heart of gold. I am very proud of him.

192666.<center>そして……長くは 生きられないと言われた\nグリエは 今も 弟を:
And... Grie, who was told he didn't have long
to live, still gently supports his brother.

192667.<center>我は あの子に ひどいことをした。\nそれなのに すべてを許し:
I did terrible things to that boy, yet his
spirit of forgiveness and compassion is much
like yours.

192668.<center>我は 息子らに 平和を遺したい。\nそのための手だてを ひとつだ:
I want to leave behind a peaceful world for
my sons, and there is only one way I can
achieve this.

192669.<center>雄峰ランドンの 山頂に眠る 戦神が\n人智を超えた チカラを与え:
Legends tell of a god of war who sleeps on the
summit of Mount Landon. It is said this god
grants power beyond mortal comprehension.

192670.<center>我は この言い伝えを たどって\n戦神の守護者に 会いにゆく。:
I will seek out the one who watches over this
god of war.

192671.<center>息子らに 平和を遺すための チカラをくれるなら\n神にでも 悪魔:
I shall offer all of my being to the god of
war, and leave behind a peaceful world for my
sons.

192672.「……見損なった。\n 息子 息子と……そんな そぶりなど\n 一度として 見せ:
I see... so that's what pushed him to do such
things. His supposed love for me and Grie.

192673.「これでは 王失格だ……。\n ゾンガロンに なるべくして なったんだ。:
He is a failure of a king... he deserves to be
Zongalon!

192675.「……雄峰ランドンの 戦神。\n おそらくは そいつが 元凶だ。:
The god of war of Landon Peak. Perhaps that's
the source of the problem.

192676.「城の前に 馬車を 用意させる。\n 俺たちも 戦神の守護者とやらに会いにいくぞ:
I'll have a wagon waiting for us at the
castle. We're going to meet the guardian of
the god of war.

192677.「……ここは 不浄の地。\n そなたたちのような者が 来る場所では\n ありませ:
This is an unholy place. It is no place for
the likes of you.

192678.「お前が 戦神の守護者か？: Are you the guardian of the god of war?

192680.「私は 戦神の……封印の守護者…… \n 六聖陣がひとり 魔封剣姫。:
I am the guardian of the god of war... the
Prison Princess, one of the Six Saints.

192681.「数年前 ここを訪れた者が いたはずだ。:
I need info about someone who visited here a
few years ago.

192682.「……確かに 戦神のチカラを求めて\n この地を訪れた オーガの王がおりました。:
Indeed, there was an Ogre king who came
here seeking the power of the god of war.

192683.「その者は 険しい雪道に 行き倒れており\n 私が 介抱していたのですが……:
The man had collapsed on a cold snowy
road, and I was taking care of him...

192684.「目を離したすきに 姿を消してしまったのです。:
When I wasn't watching, he mysteriously
disappeared.

192687.「どこで まかり間違ったのか\n そなたらの伝承に 戦神から 人智を超えた\n:
I understand that in your folklore, it is
said that warriors can come here to obtain
power from the god of war.

192688.「しかし それは 大いなる誤りです。: But that is a grave mistake.

192689.「戦神とは 戦禍の邪神…… \n 人に害をなし この世に災厄を振りまく存在。:
The god of war is a being of pure evil, one
that exists only to bring misfortune
into the world of mortals.

192690.「我が父は 邪神に魅入られたと？: So my father was possessed, is that it?

192691.「戦禍の邪神は 自らを封印した \n オーガの神 ガズバラン……ひいては\n オ:
The god of war hates Gazbalan, the Ogre
god who sealed him away...and by
extension, the entire Ogre species.

192692.「オーガたちを 滅ぼすためなら \n いかなる策謀とて こうじるでしょう。:
He will do whatever it takes to destroy the
Ogres.

192693.「おそらく あのオーガの王は\n 邪神と契約し チカラを得る代わりに\n オーガ:
Perhaps that Ogre king forged a contract,
and instead of gaining power, he was
instilled with a hatred of Ogres.

192694.「……それが ゾンガロンの真実か。: So that's how Zongalon came to be...

192695.「俺は ゾンガロンを 倒すすべを探している。\n 知恵を 授けてほしい。:
I am looking for a way to defeat Zongalon. I
need your wisdom.

192696.「あれは 邪神の加護を受けた存在……\n 倒すことは 難しいですが\n 封ずるこ:
Defeat? That would be impossible. The best you
would be able to do is seal Zongalon away.

192697.「ただし……\n 封印の術には 術者の命を使います。\n そして １００年の年月:
However, the sealing arts will claim the life
of its user, and take a century to be
completed.

192698.「あなたは 自らの命を 捧げられますか？: Are you prepared to die for that?

192699.「先王の罪は 現王の 俺の罪でもある。\n ……覚悟はできている。:
Yes. As the current king of Orseco, I will
bear the sins of the king who came before me.

192700.「よいでしょう……。\n では 魔封の術を授けましょう。:
Very well... then, I will bestow upon you the
mystical sealing arts.

192701.「……オーグリードに 光あらんことを。: May the light shine upon Ogreed.

192703.「俺は オルセコに戻り 戦の支度をする。: I must return to Orseco to prepare for battle.

192704.「すまぬが 最後の頼みだ。 \n ……グリエを探しだし 連れ帰ってほしい。:
I'm sorry, but this is my last request. I want
you to find Grie and bring him home.

192705.<pc>と ギルガランは\n馬車で オルセコ王国へ 帰った……。:
<pc> and Gilgaran returned to the
Orseco Kingdom by wagon...

192706.「……探しにきてくださったんですね。: ...You came looking for me, didn't you?

192707.「オルセコの 城を出てから…… \n 僕は ずっと 父の心を\n 取り戻すすべを:
Ever since I left Orseco, I've been searching
for a way to return my father to the man he
once was.

192708.「ちょっとした 心当たりがあって\n 各地に残る オーガの誕生にまつわる神話を\:
I had some idea of what I was looking for, so
I started with the myths surrounding the birth
of the Ogres in various places.

192710.「やみくもに 探しても……\n 本当に ほしいものは 手に入りませんね。:
You can't get what you want just by
searching blindly.

192712.「自らを 犠牲にしてでも \n ゾンガロンを 封じる術……？:
A way to seal Zongalon, but at the cost of
his own life!?

192714.「よかったら すこし お話ししましょう。: Sorry... let's talk for a while, okay?

192715.「僕が生まれた時 父 ゾルトグリンは\n たいそう 喜んだそうです。:
My father, Zoltgrin, was very happy when I was
born.

192716.「父にとって 待望の跡継ぎでしたから。:
For my father, I was the long-awaited heir to
the family.

192717.「ですが 僕は……赤ん坊の頃から 身体が弱く \n 立派なオーガに 育つ見込みが:
But... my body was sickly and weak. It became
clear that I was never going to grow up into a
great and powerful Ogre.

192718.「４歳になる頃 ギルガランが生まれると\n 父は 僕を養子に出しました。:
When I was four years old, Gilgaran was born,
and my father gave me up for adoption.

192719.「幼いながらに その意味を 察しましたし\n すこしだけ 父を 恨みました。:
Even at a young age, I understood why he did
it, and resented him a little for it.

192720.「それから 何年かして 僕は\n ギルガランの弟というていで 城に戻りました。:
Years later, I returned to the castle and
introduced myself to Gilgaran.

192721.「頑健で 身体も大きかった ギルガランは \n 子供の頃から あんな感じで……\:
Gilgaran had been like that since he was a
child... cocky, arrogant, and a jerk.

192722.「でも 別々に育ったってのに あいつは\n 僕を弟だと信じて いつも守ろうとして:
But even though we grew up apart, he believed
I was his younger brother and always tried to
protect me.

192723.「あいつは 誰かを守ることを ためらわない。\n その姿に……僕は 王の器を見ま:
He never hesitates to protect someone. In that
way... it's why I always believed he would be
a great king.

192724.「それ以来 僕の夢は さだまりました。: Since then, I put aside my own dreams.

192725.「……ギルガランを 立派な王に育てる。:
...and I tried to help Gilgaran be a great
king.

192726.「だから 弟を 死なせるわけにはいきません。: So I can't let my little brother die.

192727.「何としてでも オーガ族の神器…… \n ガズバランのしるしを 手に入れないと…:
I have to get the Gazbalan Badge, the sacred
artifact of the Ogre people, at any cost.

192729.「ほんの ささいなことでも かまいません……。\n 何か 心当たりはありませんか:
Even if it was something small... isn't there
any kind of clue...?

192732.「そんな……まさか……\n どこで これを……！？: No way... how... where did you get this!?

192733.「いや そんなことは どうでもいい。\n ありがとうございます <pc>さん……:
No, that doesn't matter. Thank you,
<pc>...

192735.「どうか 急いで オルセコ王家の墓に\n 来ていただけますか？\n すべては そ:
Please, could you hurry and come to the Orseco
Royal Tomb? I will explain everything there.

192736.「オーガよ 忘るるな。\n 胸の内に宿る 炎の音を……。:
O Ogre, do not forget. The sound of the flame
that dwells within your heart...

192737.「<pc>さん。\n この壁画には オーガの誕生にまつわる\n 神話が 描かれて:
<pc>. This mural depicts the myths
surrounding the birth of the Ogres.

192738.「……いわく 我らオーガは 怪物の身体に \n 人の心を宿すという 試みで生みだ:
They say that we Ogres were created in an
attempt to put a human mind in the body of a
monster.

192739.「原初の頃は 魔物と変わらぬ 粗暴さでしたが\n ガズバラン神がもちいた とある:
In their primordial days, they were as violent as monsters, but through the power of the god Gazbalan, they controlled their minds and
became a single species.

192740.「ゾンガロンの使う 人を獣となす光は\n オーガを 原初の状態へ 回帰させるもの:
If the power of Zongalon is to return the
Ogres to their primordial, monstrous states...

192741.「ならば ガズバラン神のもちいた 御業によって\n 心を 取り戻すことができるは:
Then, through the enlightenment of Gazbalan,
wouldn't we be able to reverse that process?

192742.「僕は ガズバラン神の伝承を 読み解くために\n ガズバランのしるしを 探してい:
I was looking for the Gazbalan Badge to
decipher the lore of the Gazbalan.

192744.「そうか……心を 制御した御業とは\n 踊りなんだ……！:
That's it... the method of controlling the
mind is through dancing...!

192745.「不思議ですね……。 \n まるで 太古の昔から知っていたように\n 脳裏に 戦:
It's strange... I could picture the war dance
in my mind as if I had known it since time
immemorial.

192746.「オーガを人と成した この舞があれば\n ゾンガロンも 心を取り戻すはずです！:
With this sacred dance, we may be able to
save my father, and everyone he's transformed!

192748.「これは……ギルガランの字……。: This is... a letter from Gilgaran...

192749.<center>グリエよ お前には 心から失望した。\n俺を ずっと昔から たば:
Grie, you disappoint me. I didn't realize you
had been lying to me for so long.

192750.<center>だが 俺は いつも考えていた。\nお前のような 穏やかな者が 王:
But to be honest, part of me has always
wondered what kind of place Orseco would be
if a kind, gentle Ogre like you was king.

192751.<center>……結局 俺は 王の器ではなかった。: ...As for me, I've been a terrible king.

192752.<center>ならば 俺は 俺のできることを果たそう。\nオルセコを 任せたぞ:
Still, I will do my duty to my people. I leave
Orseco to you, brother.

192754.「<pc>さん お願いがあります。\n ギルガランは ひとりで\n ゾンガロンの:
<pc>, I have a request. Gilgaran
must have gone alone to seal Zongalon.

192755.「僕の弟を……助けてやってください。: Please, stop him before it's too late!

192756.「……心より 感謝いたします。: I thank you from the bottom of my heart.

192757.「ゾンガロンは この大陸の北端にある\n 黄昏岬を ねぐらとしています。:
Zongalon roosts at Cape Dusk, at the northern
tip of this continent.

192758.「大陸の北へは ドランド平原の港から \n 船が 出ています。\n 話は通してお:
There are boats leaving from ports in Drand
Plains to the north of the continent. Go speak
to the ferrymen there.

192759.「……このご恩 一生 忘れません。\n 僕も 僕のやるべきことを果たしたら\n:
I will never forget what you've done for us,
<pc>. I'll follow you there as
soon as I'm ready.

192763.「親父が 敗れる姿は 見たくなかったよ。:
I didn't want to see you in this wretched
state.

192764.「いつまで 家族ごっこを続けるつもりだ？ \n ゾルトグリンの意志など もはや:
How long are you going to keep playing at
being a family? Zoltgrin no longer exists.

192765.「貴様も すべてを忘れ 獣となれ。:
You, too, shall forget all and become as a
beast.

192768.「つけあわせが 増えたところで 変わらん。\n まとめて 喰らうのみよ！:
More toppings won't make a difference. I'll
just have to eat you all at once!

192769.「せめて 最期くらいは 王として散ろうか。:
Very well. Let us both die as kings on this
day!

192770.「グハハハ……。\n 追いつめられた獣は あなどれんな。:
Guhahaha... don't underestimate a cornered
beast.

192771.「それでこそ 我がエモノに ふさわしい。 \n そろそろ 本気で狩ってくれよう。:
You have proven your resolve. It's time for me
to get serious as well!

192776.「オルセコのために 命をなげうつとはな。:
You were willing to give up your life for
Orseco.

192777.「ギルガラン様は ちゃんと民を想ってたんだ。: Prince Gilgaran was thinking of his people.

192782.「……苦労を……かけた。\n これ以上 我の愛するものを……壊させはせん。:
I'm sorry for all the trouble I've caused you.
I will not let him destroy any more of what I
love.

192783.「この意識 長くはもたぬ……\n 我が こやつを 抑えられるうちに……:
My consciousness will not last long... so
while I'm still in control...

192784.「……我が魂を 封印のくさびとせよ！: Let my soul be the wedge that seals him away!

192785.「……あなたは やはり 王だった。: Father... you were a great king after all...

192790.「兵士たちが 僕のこと からかった時……: When the soldiers were making fun of me...

192791.「キミが飛んできて 彼らを蹴散らした。\n そして……言ったんだ。:
You ran in and beat them up. And then... you
said...

192792.「お前の思慮深さは……俺にはないものだ。:
"Your thoughtfulness... is something I don't
have."

192793.「俺には 俺のできることが…… \n お前には お前のできることがある……って。:
"There are things only I can do... but there
are things only you can do, too..."

192794.「あれは ちょっと……救われた。: Those words... made me really happy.

192795.「キミは ぶっきらぼうだけど\n ……誰より 人を いとおしんでいる。:
You may be blunt... but you care more about
people than anyone else.

192796.「キミは……いい王になる。: You... will be a good king.

192797.「……そばで 見ていたかった……な……: I wish... I could have been there to see it...

192802.「そなたたちが 命を懸けて 国を救ったこと\n 俺は 生涯 忘れまい。:
I will never forget that you risked your lives
to save our country.

192803.「俺は いまだ 未熟な王だが……\n つねに おのれに問いつづけると 誓おう。:
I am still a novice king... but I swear to you
that I will never let this country down!

192804.「真の強さとは 何か……\n 真の王とは 何かを。:
Someone dear to me taught me what true
strength is... what a true king is.

192805.「俺は これからも オルセコを守りぬく。 \n どうか チカラを貸してくれ。:
So, I will continue to protect Orseco. I ask
all of you for your help and support!

192806.「そして 獅子門の難民たちにも 世話になった。:
And we are also indebted to the refugees at
Lion Gate.

192807.「ゾンガロンの脅威は 消えたわけではない。 \n そのため 封印を見張る 勇士の:
Though Zongalon is sealed, he is not gone.
Therefore, I will establish a village of brave
warriors, who will watch over the seal.

192808.「オーグリードを 守りぬく役割……\n そなたらに 頼むぞ。 \n これをもって:
I ask you... to play your part in protecting
Ogreed. Henceforth, you shall become the
shield of Ogreed!

192810.「お前には 兄ともども 世話になった。\n 心より 感謝している。:
My brother and I are indebted to you. I thank
you from the bottom of my heart.

192811.「物では 想いを伝えるに足らんが……\n これを お前の旅に 役立ててくれ。:
Mere trinkets and gold aren't enough to
convey my gratitude, but I ask that
you take this.

192812.「グリエは 本当に 生意気な弟で……\n いつも 見透かしたような 目をしている:
Grie was a really cocky little brother... I
hated the way he always had that look in his
eyes like he could see right through me.

192813.「ずっと前から……\n 兄として 見守っていてくれたんだな。:
All this time... he was watching over me as my
older brother.

192814.「お前は グリエと同じ 優しさを持っている。 \n それは……俺には ないものだ:
You've got a good heart, one filled with
compassion, just like Grie did. Something I
don't have...

192816.「この鏡にも 世話になったな。 \n ゾンガロンの封印に 役立つなら\n 後ほど:
As for this mirror, if it will be useful in
sealing Zongalon, I will deliver it to the
people of Lion Gate later.

192817.「……動物に好かれぬのは 直らんな。:
I can't fix the fact that animals don't like
me.

192818.「ようやく 元の姿に 戻れたわっ！！\n 猫背になっちゃうかと 思った！:
I'm finally back to my old self! Ahhh, my back
is killing me!

192821.「びっくりさせて ごめんなさい 王子様！ \n 私 エテーネ王宮が 異形獣に襲わ:
Sorry for all the trouble, Prince Gilgaran! My
time-travel abilities must have activated when
the Hexabeasts attacked the Royal Manor.

192822.「この時代に 来てしまったの。 \n それで さまよってるうちに ゾンガロンに\:
I ended up in this time period, and as I was
wandering around, I came across Zongalon, who
used his power to turn me into a kitty.

192823.「……言っている意味は よくわからぬが\n <pc>の 知り合いなら\n 再会で:
I have no idea what you're going on about, but
if you're a friend of <pc>, you're
a friend of mine.

192824.「<pc>よ……俺は これから\n 葬儀の支度がある。 \n いつの日か また:
I must leave now. Grie's funeral is about to
begin. Let us meet again someday.

192825.「ねえ <pc>…… \n あなた この時代に いるってことは\n 時渡りが で:
Hey <pc>... if you're in this time
period, that means you can travel through
time, right?

192826.「あら この子……魔法生物かしら？: Oh, is that... a magical creature?

192827.「どうやら コイツは \n ボクのことを知ってた 怪しいほうの\n 王女様じゃ:
Looks like this isn't the suspicious Mereade
that already knew who I was, kyu.

192828.「なかなか 面倒なことに なったキュ。\n ……かくなる上は 仕方ないキュル。\:
Normally it would be an issue, but since she's
already been caught up in this mess, I'll
explain everything to her, kyu.

192829.「まさか あなたが エテーネの民の末裔で\n 時渡りで 世界を救おうとしてるなん:
So you're a descendant of Ethene trying to
save the world by traveling through time?

192830.「えらい えらいわっ <pc>！\n 私 感動しちゃったわ！:
Wow, <pc>, that's so cool! I never
would have guessed!

192831.「私には もう 帰る場所がないから……\n よかったら あなたを手伝わせて！:
I have nowhere else to go, so... if it's
alright with you, I'd like to help!

192832.「この王女様 なかなかに 優秀な\n 時渡りのチカラを 秘めてるキュ。\n コツ:
Mereade has very good time-traveling power.
Once she gets the hang of it, we can travel
through time together, kyu.

192833.「それなら <pc>の時代に\n 行ってみたいわ！:
Yes! I'd love to go see the time where
<pc> came from!

192834.「時間設定……現代。\n エテーネルキューブ 起動キュ！:
Time set: present day. Ethenel Kyube,
activate!

192835.「うーん なんだか クラクラする？\n お星さまが まわってる？:
Oooh...I think I'm a bit dizzy...
Are the stars spinning...?

192836.「<pc>よ 帰ったか！\n なんだ その娘は……？:
Hey, <pc>, you're back! Who
is she...?

192837.「……まぁよい。\n そなたが 何をしてきたかは 知っておる。: Bah, I'll worry about that later.

192838.「今まさに グレン城が\n ゾンガロンに 襲われておる。:
Right now, Glen Castle is being attacked by
Zongalon.

192839.「急ぎ 選王の儀礼場へ 向かってくれ！: Hurry to the Rise of Royal Rites!

192840.「くっ……\n これが オーグリードの 伝説の魔獣か。:
Ggh... So this is the power of the scourge of
Ogreed!

192841.「ああ 待っていたぞ……。\n ようやく すべて 思いだしたわ。:
You! After all these years, I finally
remember!

192842.「１３００年前は よくも 封印してくれたな。\n <cs_pchero>よ……。:
The wretch that helped seal
me away 1300 years agoー<pc>...!

192843.「オルセコの王子を この手で \n 引き裂けなかったことは 心残りだが……:
My greatest regret is that I could not tear
apart the prince of Orseco myself...

192844.「代わりに 貴様を 引き裂いて\n 喰ろうてやろう！！:
Instead, I'll just rip YOU apart and
devour what's left!!

192846.「我の腹を 食い破るのは 誰だ！？: Who dares try to tear through my...?!

192851.「まさか……自らが喰らった魔獣に\n 身体を 奪われたのか。:
No way... Was he overtaken by the beast he
just ate!?

192855.「ランガーオ村に伝わる 史書にいわく。\n オルセコ王 ギルガランの治世…… \:
According to the history of Langao Village,
during King Gilgaran's reign...
A traveler named <pc> appeared.

192856.「その者 オルセコの兄弟の 心を結び\n いにしえの戦の舞を よみがえらせ\n:
<if_woman>She<else>He<endif> reunited the hearts of Orseco's two
brothers, revived the ancient war dance,
and sealed away Zongalon...

192857.「<cs_pchero>よ……。\n そなたの紡いだ絆が この舞を伝えたのだ。:
The bonds you forged across
time are now conveyed through this dance!

192859.「<cs_pchero>よ……今こそ\n オーグリードの因縁に 決着をつける時！:
<cs_pchero>... This battle will decide
the fate of all of Ogreed!

192860.「ヤツを 完全に 打ち滅ぼすのじゃ！: We must destroy that thing once and for all!

192862.「<cs_pchero>よ……。\n ゾンガロンを討った そなたのはたらき……:
<pc>, you finally brought an end
to Zongalon!

192863.「このオーグリードにて とこしえに\n 語り継がれるに ふさわしい！:
We will sing songs of your battle here for
generations!

192864.「あの 時の異分子……。 \n 来たるべき未来を おびやかしかねんな。:
That interloper again... I'll have to take
care of them before they cause any more
setbacks.

192865.「この者を……キズつけさせはせん！: I will not let you hurt them!

192866.「いったい どういうこと……？ \n なぜ あのふたりが 戦っているの！？:
What's going on...? Why are those two
fighting!?

192867.「この太刀筋……たしかに……\n たしかに 覚えがあるぞ……。:
This swordsmanship... There's...
There's no mistaking it...

192868.「主の 邪魔をするとは 何事だ。: You dare raise your weapon against your lord?

192874.「一度 賢者ルシェンダのもとへ行き\n これからのことを 話し合うがよかろう。:
We must take him to Sage Lushenda. She will
be able to take care of him better than I can.

192876.「あの黒い鎧の人は 私の叔父であり \n エテーネ王国最高の 時渡りの使い手……:
That man in the black armor is the greatest
time traveler in all of Ethene, and someone
I hold dear...

192878.大きな混乱を残したまま <cs_pchero>と\nメレアーデは 賢者ルシェンダ:
With great confusion, <cs_pchero> and
Mereade headed for Gran Zedora Castle, where
Lushenda was waiting.

192879.「<pc>！ おかえりなさい！ \n また 大変な冒険を してきたそうね。:
<pc>! Welcome back! I hear you've had
another great adventure.

192881.「あなたが この時代の勇者 \n アンルシアちゃんね！\n すごく強いのに なん:
You must be Anlucia! <pc> has
told me so much about you! It's just like they
said. You're so strong, but so cute too!

192883.「あなたがたは <pc>の\n 時渡りのチカラのことを\n 知っているようなので:
You know about <pc>'s time
travel powers, right?

192884.「私は メレアーデ。\n ５０００年前に存在した エテーネ王国の姫よ。:
I am Mereade, princess of the Ethene Kingdom,
which existed 5,000 years ago.

192885.「わけあって 時空の迷子になってしまって……\n <pc>に 助けてもらったの。:
Somehow I got lost in the timestream, but
<pc> helped me find my way back.

192886.「まあっ ちょうど エテーネ王国のことを \n ルシェンダさまに 聞いていたとこ:
Oh, I was just asking Lushenda about the
Ethene Kingdom.

192887.「ずっと昔に 消えてしまった\n とても 美しい国なんですってね。:
I heard it was a beautiful place but...
unfortunately it was destroyed a long time
ago.

192888.「このレンダーシアには エテーネの村という\n 小さな村があって……:
Here in Lendersia, there is a small village
called Ethene Village...

192891.「ようこそ メレアーデ姫。 \n 重傷を負ったファラス殿は この城で\n 責任を:
Princess Mereade. I will be responsible for
treating Faras here in the castle.

192892.「ところで……グランゼドーラを 襲った \n 黒衣の剣士の 正体が 判明したらし:
I also heard you are familiar with the Dark
Swordsman that recently attacked Gran Zedora.

192893.「はい……あの方は 間違いなく\n 私の叔父の パドレ様です。: Yes... that man is definitely my uncle, Padre.

192894.「この時代で 異形獣を操っているのが\n あの方なら……\n もしかして エテー:
...but if he's controlling the Hexabeasts in
this time, does that also mean he ordered the
attack on the Ethene Kingdom...?

192895.「ふむ……なにか 嫌な予感がするな。 \n こちらでも 黒衣の剣士の行方を捜索し:
I have a bad feeling about this. We'll order
a search for this mysterious swordsman.

192896.「そなたは これから どうするつもりだ？: What are you going to do now?

192897.「よかったら この城で 暮らさない？\n ファラスさんも ここで 治療しているの:
If you like, you can come live with us here in
the castle! Mr. Faras is also being treated
here.

192898.「ありがとう アンルシアちゃん！\n だけど 私……さっき教えてくれた\n エテ:
Thanks, Anlucia. I think I'd like to go see
that place you told me about, though. Ethene
Village...

192899.「また グランゼドーラにも 遊びにくるから \n その時は ゆっくり お茶でもし:
I'll come back and visit. Let's have some tea
together then, okay?

192900.「そう 残念だわ……。 \n いつでも 好きな時に 遊びにきてね！:
Well, that's too bad... come visit us anytime
you like!

192901.「……ということで <pc>。\n エテーネ村への 案内 よろしくね！:
Well then, <pc>. Lead the way to
Ethene Village!

192902.「ようこそ <pc>村長！\n 今日から ここが 私のおうちよ！:
Welcome, <pc>! Starting today,
this is my new home!

192903.「シンイさんに 事情を話したら\n この家を 使っていいと 言ってくれたの！:
I told Mr. Shini what happened, and he said I
could use this house!

192904.「じつは 昔から 緑いっぱいの\n 小さな村で 暮らすことに 憧れてたのよ。:
To be honest, I've always dreamed about living
in a small village full of lush greenery.

192905.「こんなに いいおうちを いただけるなんて\n <pc>村長と シンイさんに\n:
Thanks to both you and Shini, I have such a
nice home I can live in!

192906.「これから エテーネの村を 拠点にして\n がんばってみるから よろしくね。:
I'll do my best with this village as my new
home. I hope you'll stick by me every step
of the way!

192907.「それで じつは……やってみたいことがあるの。\n ぜひ 聞いてくれる？:
Um, actually...there's something I want to
try. Will you hear me out?

194799.<pc>は ラーの鏡を拾いあげ\n黒猫の姿を 映した！:
<pc> picked up the Mirror of Ra
and pointed it at the black cat!
